attributes.action: demand that Microsoft extends the life of Windows XP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Microsoft is threatening to remove Windows XP from shops at the end of July 2008. The PM should demand that Microsoft extends the life of Windows XP for as long as possible.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
